Package com.gsma.mobileconnect.r2

Interface Summary
IHasMobileConnectStatus  
 

Class Summary
ErrorResponse Class to hold a Rest error response.
ErrorResponse.Builder  
MobileConnect Convenience methods to construct and access the core public interfaces of MobileConnect.
MobileConnect.Builder Builds a configured instance of MobileConnect.
MobileConnectConfig Configuration properties for the MobileConnectInterface, reused across all requests for a single MobileConnectInterface or MobileConnectWebInterface.
MobileConnectConfig.Builder  
MobileConnectInterface Convenience wrapper for IDiscoveryService and IAuthenticationService methods for use with non-web applications.
MobileConnectInterface.Builder  
MobileConnectRequestOptions Options for a single request to MobileConnectInterface
MobileConnectRequestOptions.Builder  
MobileConnectStatus Object to hold the details of a response returned from @see MobileConnectInterface and MobileConnectWebInterface all information required to continue the process is included
MobileConnectStatus.Builder  
MobileConnectVersions Class with static helpers relating to the difference in Mobile Connect Service versions.
MobileConnectWebInterface Convenience wrapper for Mobile Connect interfaces for use with web applications.
MobileConnectWebInterface.Builder  
 

Enum Summary
InvalidArgumentException.Disallowed Flag to describe what is not allowed for the field in error.
MobileConnectStatus.ResponseType Enum of possible response types for MobileConnectStatus
 

Exception Summary
InvalidArgumentException Thrown to warn of an invalid argument on entry to a method.
InvalidResponseException Exception that is thrown where the Mobile Connect SDK has been unable to process a response received from an external service.
